description: The file defines a Java class DateIPC that implements ObjectIPC interface to facilitate JSON serialization/deserialization of Date objects for IPC mechanisms.

classes.name: DateIPC
classes.description: A class that encapsulates a Date object for IPC operations, providing methods to convert to/from JSON.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Serializes the Date to a JSONObject with milliseconds since epoch.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Deserializes the Date from a JSONObject containing milliseconds since epoch.
